name: Diamond Crush Puzzle Mania
description:
Diamond Crush Puzzle Mania is a free online match 3 game featuring tons of fun puzzles and cool boosts. Download for free and play through hundreds of awesome levels.
Beat every challenge on the way and crush and blast all the gems to level up and win points.

Join the glamorous adventure and collect all the sparkling diamonds.
Diamond Crush Puzzle Mania is the best free board game!

How to Play:
- Match at least 3 diamonds of the same type to crush and clear the board.
- Enjoy hundreds of addicting levels filled with match 3 glitter and glam.
- Make unique combos to earn special boosters that will help you beat hard levels.
- Reach high scores and try to get 3 stars on every level.
- Swap and blast diamond and clear the board.
- Complete the missions set at the beginning of each level.
- Master the challenges and the obstacles.
- Solve the fun puzzles and collect the jewels!

Play anytime, anywhere! No internet connection is required! There’s no limit so you can try as many times as you like.

Move and smash diamonds and become the winner of the diamond mania!
Match 4 gems to get a striped item of this color and create a line blast.
Match 5 jewels in an L or T form to get a bomb that will explode surrounding items.
Match 5 items in a row to get a rainbow blast.

Diamond Crush Puzzle Mania Features:
- Hundreds of dazzling levels packed with beautiful shiny gemstones
- Stylish graphics and designs
- Plenty of colorful and shiny gems
- Awesome boosters, power-ups and bonuses
- Addictive gameplay
- Easy to learn but can be tricky to master!
- Completely free to play
- Perfect free puzzle matching game for your iPhone or iPad device.

Immerse yourself in a world of fun and sheer amusement, enjoy the fun match-3 puzzles and challenges, reach the target and win levels!

Play today and advance through the splendid diamond world. You’ll definitely enjoy the addictive gameplay and all the exciting puzzles and logic riddles.
PLAY NOW and rate us!
